[H3]Hyperfoil 1000-XTC (Landspeeder)[h3]
The Hyperfoil 1000-XTC's unusual hybrid design combines repulsorlift drives and air-cushioned hovercraft engines. Capable of true vertical take-off and landing, the Hyperfoil can achieve a moderately high altitude for a landspeeder and boasts powerful engines, smooth handling, and an impressive cargo capacity.
